biotools.summary: MetaQuad is a tool designed to detect shared informative variants in a population of shotgun metagenomic data. It uses a density clustering model to assess the informative variants among background noise. MetaQuad is an extension of MQuad, specifically tailored to support shotgun metagenomic data.

bioschemas.name: MetaQuad
